Shara'Kor the Widowmaker is a demon released with the Zamorak's demon invasion event.

They have a chance to appear once enough lesser demons have been killed, and defeating Shara'Kor ends the invasion. Defeating them always gives a reward item, provided that the player hasn't already received all of them during the day.

Their life points scale with the number of players in the area.

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • hotfix 20 June 2022:
    • Life points changed to scale with the number of players in the area.
  • update 20 June 2022 (Update):
    • Added to game.
